references.paper_title: Cosmos world foundation model platform for physical ai.
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational large-scale model platform, relevant to Goku's development.

references.paper_title: Imagen video: High definition video generation with diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper is highly influential due to its introduction of a high-quality video generation method using diffusion models, which shares conceptual similarity with Goku's approach.

references.paper_title: Gentron: Diffusion transformers for image and video generation.
references.reason: This paper presents an important foundation for Goku's Transformer architecture and its application to both images and videos.
This paper introduces the rectified flow formulation that is central to Goku's model design, enabling improved efficiency and performance.

references.paper_title: Cogvideox: Text-to-video diffusion models with an expert transformer.
references.reason: This work is highly related due to its use of diffusion models and transformers for video generation, a similar approach used in the Goku model family.
